DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 65 year old . BMI > 20 < 27 Adequate education level comprehension clinical study . Willingness participate study volunteer provide write consent . Diagnosis Type I Diabetes . BMI > 27 Dyslipidemia pharmacological treatment . High blood pressure . Dementia , neurological disease reduction cognitive function .
